content: 2023 Singaporean film ***Dreaming & Dying*** ([Chinese](/wiki/Chinese_language): 好久不見) is a 2023 Singaporean [experimental](/wiki/Experimental_film) [fantasy drama](/wiki/Fantasy_drama) film directed by Nelson Yeo. The debut feature of Yeo, the film revolves around three middle-aged friends who are meeting for the first time in years and things take a turn when something from their past resurfaces. The film premiered at the [Locarno Film Festival](/wiki/Locarno_Film_Festival) in August 2023, where it won the [Golden Leopard – Filmmakers of the Present](/wiki/Golden_Leopard_%E2%80%93_Filmmakers_of_the_Present) and Swatch First Feature Award. ## Cast - Doreen Toh - [Peter Yu](/wiki/Peter_Yu) - Kelvin Ho ## Production The English title *Dreaming and Dying* derives from a Chinese idiom *zuì shēng mèng sǐ* (醉生梦死), which means leading a befuddled life as if drunk or in a dream. The film was entirely shot in Singapore. - *Dreaming & Dying* at [IMDb](/wiki/IMDb_(identifier)) This article related to a Singaporean film is a stub.
